title: When I was a kid, I thought they were stupid
content: When I was a kid, my parents made us all wear Crocs, and I thought they were stupid. Now that I'm an adult, I understand how truly awesome these are. The perfect shoe for a quick walk outside, or as an all-terrain shoe. I often wear them out because I might want to walk in a river or something, and they are perfect for whatever I want to do. Originally purchased to wear when I went fishing, but I've been wearing them more than any other shoe since.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: When ordering Crocs, always know they are supposed to fit a little "big". I ordered 1/2 size larger than my regular size so my heal isn't hanging over the edge. These are perfect! Now, keeping the white clean is a challenge.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2024

title: Just what I ordered!
content: I am absolutely thrilled with my new crocs! I was a bit skeptical at first, but these crocs have exceed my expectations in every way. The moment I put them on, I knew I had made the right choice. First of all, they are incredibly soft & comfortable. The material is like warm hug for my feet, & I can wear them for hours on end without any discomfort. The softness is not just limited to the insoles, but the entire shoe is flexible& gentle on my skin.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Not only are they comfortable, but  they are also pretty! I got the black ones, and they are add a pop of fun to my outfit. The design is sleek and modern, and I love how they come in a variety of color to match my mood & style. But what really impressed me is how durable they are. The material is easy to clean, and they dry quickly, making them perfect for any adventure. They are a game changer in comfort & style, I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a reliable & cozy footwear option.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2024

title: A Game Changer in Comfort & Style
content: First time Crocs buyer and i can see why everyone loves them. Very comfortable and airy. Seems like one would slip out of them with the extra-wide soles but you do not. The nodules on the top of the sole help with traction and are not uncomfortable to step on. They are a little squeaky when walking around, but maybe they need to be broken in a little.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I am generally a half size, and ordered a size up and have no complaints.

title: Verified Purchase
content: This came even quicker than I expected.  It replaces a pair that had the heel strap come off.  What can I say?  It's crocs and if that's not what you expect you shouldn't buy it.

title: very comfortable
content: I have always thought Crocs were hideous.  Everyone wore them, EVERYWHERE and I didn't get it at all. I've seen people in NYC walking around in Crocs (sometimes with socks um OK). I just didn't get it. I never would have thought of wearing them, ever! But as I've learned, from recently moving from a lifetime in the city to a very remote rural property that came with gorgeous landscaping and a beautiful natural lawn, that I am now tasked with keeping gorgeous (OMG!), that sneakers are not appropriate footwear for that type of work, not when you're kneeling in the dirt and walking in water. So, I gave in. I own Crocs now. I got the red pepper color because I still want to look cute even if I'm just gardening. That color certainly grabs your attention, I must let you know that they are a bright red. Like a real red pepper, red. Keep that in mind if you're looking for a subtle color.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: The way they size them without 1/2 sizes threw me off, but I read that they run a bit larger. My feet are size 8.5 women, so I bought size 8 and they fit perfect. They are so comfortable!!

title: I'm never one to jump on trends, so I'm kind of late to the party, but they're nice
content: They fit a little bit more snug than I liked but they are loosening up a little bit and the knobs on the inside of the shoe where your foot rests when they're brand new does kind of bother my feet. But they relax a little bit over time. They grab your socks if you wear with socks and it makes it hard to take these things off.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I spend a lot of time in a wheelchair. I went one size larger because my feet tend to swell and i will probably go two sizes larger because the one size up feels so good I think two sizes would be better!

title: Verified Purchase
content: Crocs are notoriously sized wrong but I was able to go by a pair my 14 year old son already had. I measured his foot and, knowing that they run about 1 size big, I went with the size it suggested because I wanted him to have some room to grow. His foot measured at exactly a menâ€™s size 10 which is his accurate size in shoes, BUT a size 10 in crocs fits like an 11. Now, he has just enough space in them that theyâ€™ll fit for at least a little while. If your foot is finished growing, Iâ€™d recommend sizing down 1 full size for a perfect fit.

title: Ugly and comfortable, just like me
content: I've been making fun of these things and the people who wear them for a decade at least. Well now the payback is here and I have terrible neuropathy in my feet. I caved in and decided to give these a try after going through numerous other options. Yep, I wish they were better looking but they are incredibly comfortable. I wear them as house slippers now and will be buying more pairs if they last, which it seems like they will.
